Package com.cdd.lab6

package com.cdd.lab6
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Buffer
    A buffer class containing an array of integers and the semaphores necessary to synchronise access to the buffer by Producer/threads.
    Consumer
    A consumer task that will retrieve values from the shared buffer and consume them (by printing them to the screen).
    Main
    Driver containing the main class.
    Producer
    A producer task that will producer a random integer values and push them onto a shared buffer as long as the buffer is not full.
